nodes.bodyText:
Hint: If the English localization is simple enough and rather unlikely to change, it can be put here directly, saves having to create a "default" properties file.
Stylistic preference only.
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText:
If I understand correctly, your suggestion would be to use ${%Dashboard} (title case) and remove the default properties, since it will use the property name as the value, right?
Can do that. Although when the i18n suggestion came along, I liked the idea of having a properties for the breadcrumbs, since I would expect it to eventually have more properties in it. I'll change it to title case and squash commits, but leaving the file there. If it is decided to remove it, I'm OK with it.

nodes.bodyText:
Should this be title-cased? It is elsewhere:

  
    
      jenkins/core/src/main/resources/hudson/logging/LogRecorderManager/sidepanel_es.properties
    
    
         Line 23
      in
      22aa2e6
    
    
    
    

        
          
           Back\ to\ Dashboard=Volver al Panel de Control

nodes.bodyText:
I had the same doubt, @fqueiruga, but I saw it was being used already in other places and since I was trying to test the new breadcrumb at least in another language, I added it.
I'll use title case per Daniel's suggestion, but no hard opinion if it is decided to remove it.
